CustomField.description: Signifies the likelihood an inbound lead will convert based on a variety of metrics
CustomField.formula: If(OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'MVF'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'BuyerZone')),IF(Number_of_Calls_by_Current_Owner_Roll_Up__c<1,6,IF(Number_of_Calls_by_Current_Owner_Roll_Up__c<2,2.5,2)), IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Capterra'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Software Advice')),4, IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Adwords'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Bing')), IF(Number_of_Calls_by_Current_Owner_Roll_Up__c<4,4,IF(Number_of_Calls_by_Current_Owner_Roll_Up__c<7,3,2)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Facebook Form'),IF(Number_of_Calls_by_Current_Owner_Roll_Up__c<5,3,2), IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Intercom'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Inbound call / email'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Free Trial Request Form'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Website Visitor'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Website Form')),IF(Number_of_Calls_by_Current_Owner_Roll_Up__c<7,5,3), 2)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Signifies the likelihood an inbound lead will convert based on a variety of metrics
CustomField.label: Inbound Lead Conversion
